Class com.google.common.util.concurrent.Futures

Removed Methods
ListenableFuture<O> compose(ListenableFuture<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>) Returns a new {@code ListenableFuture} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
ListenableFuture<O> compose(ListenableFuture<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>, Executor) Returns a new {@code ListenableFuture} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
Future<O> compose(Future<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>) Returns a new {@code Future} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
 

Added Methods
(CheckedFuture<V, X>) makeChecked(ListenableFuture<V>, Function<Exception, X>) Creates a CheckedFuture out of a normal ListenableFuture and a Function that maps from Exception instances into the appropriate checked type.
ListenableFuture<O> transform(ListenableFuture<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>) Returns a new {@code ListenableFuture} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
ListenableFuture<O> transform(ListenableFuture<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>, Executor) Returns a new {@code ListenableFuture} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
Future<O> transform(Future<I>, Function<?, super, I, ?, extends, O>) Returns a new {@code Future} whose result is the product of applying the given {@code Function} to the result of the given {@code Future}.
